alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 12:25PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...BRIEF BLIZZARD CONDITIONS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SHERIDAN COUNTY... HAZARDS...An area of blowing snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1222 PM MDT, an area blowing snow was occurring on Highway 5 east of Plentywood. Winds gusting to 45 mph will continue for the next couple hours and create near-blizzard conditions. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... This area of blowing snow will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Sheridan County. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this area of blowing snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
